description:
BundleTransformer.SassAndScss contains translator-adapter `SassAndScssTranslator`. This adapter makes translation of Sass- and SCSS-code to CSS-code by using the LibSass Host for .NET (http://github.com/Taritsyn/LibSassHost) version 0.4.1 (supports libSass version 3.3.2). Also contains debugging HTTP-handler `SassAndScssAssetHandler`, which is responsible for text output of translated Sass- or SCSS-asset.

For correct working of the LibSass Host require assemblies `msvcp120.dll` and `msvcr120.dll` from the Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013.
summary: BundleTransformer.SassAndScss contains translator-adapter `SassAndScssTranslator`. title: Bundle Transformer: Sass and SCSS
